transcription: This is a classic rivalry. Two very similar brands of football. Physical football. Four quarter games. The toughest guy wins. I liken it to a heavyweight championship fight. It talks about rivalry.  Order States playing for a trophy which signifies victory. Everybody gets into this game. The players, our fans, even our managers. The winner of this game will be the most physical and the team that makes the most big plays. Who's gonna flinch? Who wants to win this game? It's big boy football.  you
